name: Escape from P.O.W.E.R.
description:
Pissed-off Women Emergency Response - a secret facility set up to contain female rage.

Your task is to escape (running out of P.O.W.E.R.).

Please give it a go, I wasn't able to create enticing gameplay, but I'm quite rusty since I haven't done a Ludum Dare since LD33 so hopefully it's good enough!

I have spent most of the time on the art, which is a first for me.

Made in Unity 2017.1, so I think that's what you'll need if you plan on using the source code
